octavia_load_balancer_list_l7_policies_d: The L7 Policies describe the actions taken by the Load Balancer if all the rules in the Policy return the value “True”. The logic of layer-7 load balancing (application) is therefore applied.
octavia_load_balancer_create_l7_policy_s: Your L7 policy {{ policy }} has been created. You can now create an L7 Rule.
octavia_load_balancer_edit_l7_policy_suc: Your L7 policy {{ policy }} has been modified.
octavia_load_balancer_list_l7_policies_d: Your L7 policy {{policy}} has been deleted!
